metaTitle: LEVASSUR HOME 08HH Daya Nueva | Villas from €349,900
metaDescription: Discover LEVASSUR HOME 08HH in Daya Nueva, Alicante. Luxury villas and bungalows from €349,900. 3 bedrooms, modern amenities, completion 2028. Buy now.

content.heroIntro:
LEVASSUR HOME 08HH represents a premium residential development in the heart of Pueblo Salinas, Daya Nueva, crafted by the esteemed PROPERTY Y CONSULTING OFFICE. This exclusive collection offers just 3 properties featuring sophisticated villas and bungalows starting from €349,900, designed for discerning buyers seeking Costa Blanca excellence. Each residence boasts 3 bedrooms, 2-3 bathrooms, and generous living spaces ranging from 94-128m² built area, set on substantial 218m² plots. With delivery scheduled for January 2028, LEVASSUR HOME 08HH combines contemporary architecture with practical design, featuring private pool options, modern kitchens, and premium finishes throughout.

Located in one of Alicante's most sought-after coastal communities, LEVASSUR HOME 08HH places you within 20 minutes of pristine Blue Flag beaches, 30 minutes from the regional hospital, and moments from championship golf courses. The development attracts an established international community where English is widely spoken, making it ideal for expatriates seeking Mediterranean lifestyle without compromising on modern comfort. PROPERTY Y CONSULTING OFFICE's reputation for quality construction ensures these properties represent exceptional value, priced 40% below comparable Spanish island markets while delivering consistent year-on-year appreciation of 8%.

locationSection.intro: Pueblo Salinas in Daya Nueva embodies the authentic Costa Blanca experience—a vibrant coastal community where traditional Spanish charm meets contemporary convenience. This strategically positioned location offers the perfect balance between peaceful residential living and accessible urban amenities. Daya Nueva has emerged as one of Alicante's most desirable addresses, attracting international investors and families who value proximity to natural beauty, excellent infrastructure, and a welcoming multicultural environment. The area benefits from well-maintained local markets including Mercadona and Lidl, comprehensive healthcare facilities with English-speaking practitioners, and a robust community of expatriates who have established thriving social networks. Whether you're seeking a holiday retreat, permanent residence, or investment property, Pueblo Salinas delivers Mediterranean authenticity with modern convenience, all while maintaining its distinctive character and charm.

Hospital: Regional hospital within 30 minutes, private clinics with English-speaking doctors
Shopping: Mercadona, Lidl, Consum, local markets

PROPERTY Y CONSULTING OFFICE ensures every residence meets strict European building codes while delivering the comfort and sophistication expected in Costa Blanca's premium market segment.

content.investmentSection: LEVASSUR HOME 08HH presents compelling investment fundamentals in a market demonstrating robust +8% year-on-year appreciation. Properties in Daya Nueva command exceptional value, priced 40% below comparable residential developments in Spain's island markets, while delivering superior amenities and accessibility. Rental potential reaches €800 per week for 7-night vacation lets, generating attractive returns for investors seeking income-producing assets. The region's established international community, professional expatriate networks, and growing reputation as a lifestyle destination ensure strong rental demand and tenant quality. Market analysts project continued growth driven by infrastructure improvements, coastal accessibility, and Alicante's emergence as a European investment hotspot. LEVASSUR HOME 08HH's completion in 2028 positions buyers at the optimal entry point for capturing appreciation gains while enjoying immediate lifestyle benefits.

faqs.question: Is Daya Nueva a good place to buy property?
faqs.answer: Yes, absolutely. Daya Nueva features an established international community where English is commonly spoken, making it ideal for expatriates. The market shows +8% year-on-year appreciation, with excellent amenities including a regional hospital within 30 minutes, multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes, and several championship golf courses nearby.
